title: Feature Request: Status Icon next to each Connection at Overview
author: Chrisu02
body_snippet:

## Expected Behavior
Hello Team,
I would like to Request an Option to see the "Status" LED Icon next to each PC at the Connection Overwiew.

## Current Behavior
Currently, you need to click on each connection to see if a PC is available or not, you can not see quickly which Computers are Online and which not.
